info.description: This is cards service api spec.
info.title: Cards Service

post.description: UpdateAccountCardDesign will store user's onboarding card design

get.description:
GetAppCards returns cards to show in app.
Cancelled cards are filtered and cards are sorted with active & primary in front.

post.description: CreateCard will return the relevant card information
post.summary: CreateCard creates new card with PID

get.description: GetGatewayCardImage returns card image for a card for API Gateway

post.description: UpdateCard updates the status of the card given a valid status request and returns the card info after the changes.
Activate Card activate the card in galileo
CommitPINChange commits the pin set/reset to galileo
CreateCardPINChangeURL creates url to Galileo form to change card PIN

get.description: GetMastercardSwitch returns the state of the mastercard switch for an account group

put.description: UpdateMastercardSwitchCompleted will update the MC Switch state to completed for an account group

post.description: BulkCardStatusUpdate update cards status in bulk

get.description: GetCard returns card image or card details for a card

patch.description: UpdateCard updates the status of the card given a valid status request and returns the card info after the changes.

get.description: GetAdminCards returns cards to show in app.

patch.description: UpdateCard updates the status of the card given a valid status request and returns the card info after the changes.

post.description: MigrateJointToMastercard will migrate a limited number of eligible joint accounts to Mastercard

get.description: GetPartnerCards will return the cards for a given partner user
GetPartnerCardInfo will return the relevant card information

post.description: UpdateCard updates the status of the card given a valid status request and returns the card info after the changes.

get.description:
GetPartnerCardImage will return the link for the requested cardid
if the card is not found, the response is Forbidden

description.description: These are not being used but are here to avoid breaking the contract in FE, consider removing this in the future

distributor.description: will be returned to avoid breaking changes but will always be empty since instant cards are deprecated

original_card_id.description:
OriginalCardID contains the first card ID seen of the current card
i.e: For reissued cards it will contain the first source_card_id
